name: places/ChIJN5N9u5lZwokRottIPk3gfC0
adrFormatAddress: 646 11th Ave, New York, NY 10036-2004, USA

originalText.text: I will start this review of by saying my time was well spent at Cadillac of Manhattan. My advisor, Justin, was phenomenal up front and very knowledgeable about the vehicles. I specified what I wanted and he made it happen. Laid everything out for me, spoke with management and it was a smooth process. Would highly recommend again for any vehicle needs.

text.text: I will start this review of by saying my time was well spent at Cadillac of Manhattan. My advisor, Justin, was phenomenal up front and very knowledgeable about the vehicles. I specified what I wanted and he made it happen. Laid everything out for me, spoke with management and it was a smooth process. Would highly recommend again for any vehicle needs.

originalText.text: Ask for Mr.Bordina, he was amazing & very knowledgeable! He took me step by step through the whole process and made my experience absolutely seamless. He clearly goes above and beyond for his customers and exceeded my expectations. I couldn’t have asked for better service overall. Highly recommend….outstanding service by an exceptional team ! Thank you again for the 2023 Cadillac Escalade!!

text.text: Ask for Mr.Bordina, he was amazing & very knowledgeable! He took me step by step through the whole process and made my experience absolutely seamless. He clearly goes above and beyond for his customers and exceeded my expectations. I couldn’t have asked for better service overall. Highly recommend….outstanding service by an exceptional team ! Thank you again for the 2023 Cadillac Escalade!!

originalText.text: Cadillac of Manhattan delivered on a Cadillac Escalade. From start to finish it was a pleasure working with Greg Hampton. I had emailed the dealership and Greg was quick to respond to all my questions and pricing. They kept their promise and it was simple as sign and drive when I arrived to pickup the vehicle. No tricks or gimmicks. Thank you Greg for being a honorable salesman and for a seamless, straightforward experience!

text.text: Cadillac of Manhattan delivered on a Cadillac Escalade. From start to finish it was a pleasure working with Greg Hampton. I had emailed the dealership and Greg was quick to respond to all my questions and pricing. They kept their promise and it was simple as sign and drive when I arrived to pickup the vehicle. No tricks or gimmicks. Thank you Greg for being a honorable salesman and for a seamless, straightforward experience!

originalText.text:
Stay away at all costs. This dealer is the reason why folks have the bad impression that all dealers are thieves. This one in specific did a bait and switch on me. I was the first on scene to view a vehicle and when the terms were agreed on, they refused to disclose an interest rate or run my credit. They wanted me to leave my trade in plus a deposit. They stated that they couldn’t give me the car due to a missing title. The excuse was that the title for the vehicle was not in. Next thing you know I got an email saying the car was sold. So, in my case  the car couldn’t be sold because they had no title, yet a miracle happened, and they were able to sell the car. All along they did not want to sell me the vehicle because they advertised the wrong price and wanted to get more for it. Stay away especially Mr. Justin Bordina. This was not a good experience. The dealer uses tactics such as (buy rate and sell rate) in which they mark up the interest to make money on the loan as well. We are not just talking a few dollars, in some cases 15k! They lure you in with a great price then screw you on the loan. VERY SHADY DEALER STAY AWAY!! Trust me, do not waste your time.

P.S
Weird enough that same night after I spoke with Justin. I got an email from him pushing another vehicle on me. That there told me he had this plan all along. Why would you send me information on another vehicle know we were only interested in one and waiting on a title? LAIRS!! And THIEVES!!

originalText.text:
Title:
Outstanding Cadillac Service Experience with Mr. Patrick Martin

Review:
I recently visited the Cadillac service center and had an exceptional experience. Mr. Patrick provided outstanding service, demonstrating professionalism and expertise. He listened to my concerns, explained necessary repairs, and answered all my questions with deep knowledge of Cadillac vehicles. Mr. Patrick kept me informed throughout the process and provided accurate time estimates. The technicians' work was of the highest quality, exceeding my expectations. I highly recommend the Cadillac service center and Mr. Patrick for their exceptional service and expertise. Thank you for a flawless experience!
